title: Google\Cloud\Logging\PsrLogger
name: PsrLogger
description: A PSR-3 compliant logger used to write entries to Google Stackdriver Logging.

params.name: logger
params.description: The logger used to write entries.

params.name: resource
params.description: The monitored resource to associate log entries with.

params.name: message
params.description: The message to log.

params.name: context
params.description: Please see Google\Cloud\Logging\PsrLogger::log() for the available options.

params.name: context.httpRequest
params.description: Information about the HTTP request associated with this log entry, if applicable. Please see the API docs for more information.

params.name: context.labels
params.description: A set of user-defined (key, value) data that provides additional information about the log entry.

params.name: context.operation
params.description: Additional information about a potentially long-running operation with which a log entry is associated. Please see the API docs for more information.
